revised_title: A Detailed Study of the Mitraria Larva of Owenia fusiformis Delle Chiaje
tldr: The author investigates the Mitraria larva of Owenia fusiformis Delle Chiaje, a unique marine creature with a rapid and astonishing metamorphosis. The study focuses on the fully formed trochosphere and the young worm after metamorphosis, providing a detailed account of the larva's development and anatomy. The research contributes to the understanding of the biology and life cycle of this enigmatic sea creature.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
